name: Calm Cards - Spider
description:
Calm Cards - Spider has a meditative quality to it. Select how many suits you want in the game to regulate the difficulty. Then sit back and relax while you recharge your energy and regain your focus.

The game contains:
- Beautiful and smooth animations
- Animated space background 
- Relaxing music 
- Soothing sounds of birds
- Traditional or enlarged card illustrations
- Choose how many suits you want to play with

The game is free from:
- Ads
- In-app purchases
- Leaderboards
- Stress
